body:
You want to know the **World Golf Rankings** after each week of the PGA Tour? 

Bet Refinery has got your back.

However, we're not giving you the official ones? 

Go **[here ](http://www.owgr.com/ranking)**for the square version.

We're giving you the **betting version** of the World Golf Rankings. Where recent form counts for more. Where you can't win two tournaments seven months ago and sit at number five.

- - -

## **Bet Refinery World Golf Rankings**

![World Golf Rankings Bet Refinery](/images/uploads/world-golf-rankings.png "World Golf Rankings | Top Golfers")

- - -

## **Our Top Golfers vs Official World Golf Rankings**

The key to betting is having a different opinion than the market. 

We use a sophisticated predictive model for our opinion. Using dozens of features, the python created robot filters out the noise to seek the truth.

**Patrick Cantlay**

* Model 3 vs OWGR 10

**Sergio Garcia**

* Model 12 vs OWGR 39

**Rickie Fowler**

* Model 21 vs OWGR 32

**Billy Horschel**

* Model 25 vs OWGR 38

- - -

## **Golf Picks**

Fresh **[FedEx St Jude Invitational Picks](https://www.betrefinery.com/golf-betting/fedex-st-jude-invitational-picks)** for this weekend.

Plus, don't forget our **[Expert Betting Guide](https://www.betrefinery.com/golf-betting/how-to-bet-on-golf)**.
title: World Golf Rankings (For Sports Bettors)
seoTitle: World Golf Rankings (For Sports Bettors) | Top Golfers
description: Live World Golf Rankings, updated every week. Jon, Rory, JT, who is on top now?
